aircraft.value: Albatross Transport - AC-9550-449 at Sector South Station

defect_observed.value: Brake system pressure decay. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Vibration induced loosening of mechanical fasteners

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Steering Control component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps

preventive_action.value: Update technical documentation with lessons learned

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 06/10/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 09/10/2024 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 08/10/2024 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 10/10/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 16/10/2024 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Steering Control component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
